summary: These ain\'t runway models. Finally, women warriors of Skyrim are just as dirty and weather-worn as the men!
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i102.photobucket.com/albums/m117/blacksun1942/lore-title2_zpsc201e3c3.png[/IMG][/center]
[center][i]Suddenly, the bandit casts a glance towards the shadows dancing in the dull glow of the small campfire. You hope that the cave is dark enough, that the heavy, smoky air and stagnant dust that fills the place will be enough to keep her from seeing you. Had your movements been more careful, she might not have taken her eyes off of the charred skeever, but your armor weighs you down, and your mud-caked boots feel like bear traps on your well-worn feet. The bandit mutters to herself in a furtive rasp, \"I thought I heard something.\" Luckily, she\'d only slowly begun to grip the blood-stained axe hanging from her belt by the time your sword was jutting out of her chest, your other hand firmly over her mouth. Luckily, she was alone.

Despite the damage you\'d done to her armor, you figure that you can pawn it off to that insatiable merchant at Whiterun. After all, any piece of loot you can haul will make the trip that much more worthwhile.

As you slip the breastplate off of her limp body, you can\'t help but notice something odd about the woman warrior you\'ve just slain. In the flickering light, you see that her cherubic features are undirtied by the stagnant must of the cave or the ash that swirls around the fire. Indeed, so flawlessly clean is her face, so pristine is the makeup that adorns her, so impossibly perfect is her skin, you can\'t help but recoil. As you scan her preternaturally smooth body, an eerie feeling wells up in you. There isn\'t a single speck of dirt. Not a solitary mote of dust. How can this be? What kind of being is this?[/i]
***[/center]
[u][b]Version 4.0[/b][/u] [i](Final...?)[/i]
- All textures uncompressed 8.8.8. RGB format.
- New face custom-made texture, eyes are closer match to v1 face.
- Slight touch-ups to body, additional minor dirt added.
- Foot seams fixed (for real this time) [i](I hope!)[/i]
- Four hair styles to choose from; all three body types included [b][i]SEE INSTRUCTIONS for more[/b][/i].
- UNP only (this *may* work with the vanilla mesh).
- [b]Optional release[/b] compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28645]Nuska Real Skin for Women[/url]
[i]I may work on a version that allows for customization via NMM install options. Other than, if nobody finds any errors, this will likely be the [u]final release[/u].
[b]I HEARBY grant permission for anyone to uses these meshes/textures in their own future releases here on Skyrim Nexus so long as proper credits are given for resources (see file credits).[/b][/i]

[u][b]Version 3.1[/b][/u]
- Quick fix- foot seams fixed.
[u][b]Version 3.0[/b][/u]
- *All* textures completely re-done from scratch.
- Neck, hand, body seams meticulously improved with help from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7582]Perfect neck seam[/url]; seams may still be visible under certain lighting conditions.
- Dirt and leg hair are more subtle.
- Face and neck touched-up by hand.
- Lips are thinner and a neutral, more realistic color.
- Feet and toenails are dirtier.
- Vasculature added to arms but made much more subtle over whole body.
- [b][i][u]Please note that this was made and thoroughly tested under ENB conditions; your experience may vary![/i][/b][/u]
- [b][u]UNP only[/b][/u] for now; This [b][i]may work with vanilla meshes[/b][/i], but it\'s untested at this time.
- THANKS for all the positive feedback and support! Enjoy!
--- 

[center][b][i]***A note about seams***[/i][/b]
Seams are impossible to avoid in certain lighting conditions. Much time and care has been invested in color, normal, spec, and sk maps to reduce seams as much as possible. You may notice seams in the body, feet, hands, and neck.
[b]Please feel free to work on these textures and release any improvements as you choose (with proper credits). [u]I give full permission for any future releases on Skyrim Nexus.[/u] You might want to try to work with the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7582]Perfect neck seam[/url] mod; this has already been used to reduce seams, but further improvements might be possible![/b][/center]

--- 
If medieval history is any indication, cave-dwelling warriors probably shouldn\'t have bodies so utterly clean that they would put runway models to shame. Bethesda got that right with vanilla males; their hairy bodies are covered in dirt and mud. Not so with females.

Disappointed in the lack of female textures that might adequately portray what weather-worn farmers or dirt-stained bandits might look like, I decided to put together my own set. I was greatly inspired by betterbecause\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24394]Body Imperfect[/url], but an updated UNP-compatible version was lacking.

Another disappointment I\'d had is that vanilla female underwear seems like a Flintstone-esque juxtaposition to the simple loincloths worn by men. I also thought that complete nudity was a bit immersion-breaking, but then again, so were the bikini tops. Although breast underwear dates to at least antiquity, such garments usually had some degree of exposure, and their use by all but the elites is more or less a modern invention; Indeed, female toplessness has been a cultural norm throughout the vast majority of human existence.

[center][size=28][b][u]What this mod does[/b][/u][/size][/center]

[b]- [i]UNP only[/i].
- Set of textures for body, head, and hands. Dirtier bodies, but no major distinguishing stains, scars, or other features so that females won\'t look like clones. The textures were re-colored and dirtied by hand in order to compliment the vanilla male textures. (The face has been left relatively dirt-free so that you can add dirt in the sliders or not as you choose).
- Realistic, detailed normal map for the face.
- Body normal map includes veins and slightly improved musculature (why are the men the only ones with vascularity??)
- UNP meshes (weight slider compatible) are topless, with Beads Bikini bottom.
- New texture for Beads Bikini bottom uses same fabric as vanilla male loincloth.

[center][size=3][b][i]*In order for vampires to look right, you may need this mod*
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25382]Vampire Skin Color FIX[/url] by Loshirai14[/i][/b][/size][/center]

[size=5][b][u]USES ASSETS FROM THE FOLLOWING MODS[/b][/u][/size]
[b](my great thanks)[/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] by dimon99
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24394]Body Imperfect[/url] by betterbecause
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554]CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible[/url] by navetsea
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25531]High-Res Female Nord Skin[/url] by nuska
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24273]Freckled face texture for UNP[/url] by nuska
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19905]Female Muscle Mod - CBBE V3 and UNP[/url] by Arizona_Steve
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7557]Beads Bikini UNP[/url] by japantarou
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27758]Beads Bikini UNP by japantarou Fixed and UNPB also BBP[/url] by MrTroubleMaker
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7582]Perfect neck seam[/url] by radioragae

[b][u]Additional mods used in screenshots[/u][/b]
- My own custom-made vampire eyes (my char is a vamp)
- Bethesda\'s HD textures
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25382]Vampire Skin Color FIX[/url] by Loshirai14
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4307]AOF Believable Hair -Female and Male-[/url] (sharper) by AnOldFriend
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7305]UNP Female Armors[/url] by Exeter
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7654]Realistic Lighting With Customization[/url] by The Realistic Lighting Team
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27010]Photo Realistic ENB[/url] (tweaked by me) by khudilo
[url=http://enbdev.com]ENB v0.123[/url] by Boris
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11130]HN66s Earrings[/url] by humannature66
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28014]Dawnguard Vampire Armors Retexture[/url] by Messias Mummo
